original_text:
But the Lord sits enthroned forever;
    he has established his throne for justice,
korean_text: 여호와께서 영원히 앉으심이여 심판을 위하여 보좌를 준비하셨도다

sentences.original_text: But the Lord sits enthroned forever
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주님은 영원히 옥좌에 앉아 계시고

sentences.original_text: he has established his throne for justice,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서는 공의를 위해 자신의 보좌를 세우셨습니다,
